subject: AW: [junit] Re: j2me unit testing
msgSnippet: _some_ instances of J2ME don t have reflection, but not all. J2ME CDC (Connected Device Configuration) for instance does support reflection (and it is not
messageBody:
_some_ instances of J2ME don't have reflection, but not all. J2ME CDC
(Connected Device Configuration) for instance does support reflection
(and it is not based on kvm).

ok, i am sorry- what you say is correct

roland
